title: Service User Engagement Education Through Nursing Simulation Debriefing

context.additional_context: An online training course strengthening nursing simulation debriefing competencies through collaboration with service users. It combines real-case-based simulations and asynchronous discussion activities to enhance learners' practical application skills.
